name: Paragon House and Residence
address: Điền xá quang tiến sóc sơn, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Hà Nội, cách Phủ Thành Chương 11 km, Paragon House and Residence cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi ngoài trời, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, nhà hàng và quầy bar. Khách sạn 3 sao này có dịch vụ tiền sảnh. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tất cả các phòng có tủ quần áo.

Paragon House and Residence có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet mỗi buổi sáng.

Chỗ nghỉ có sân hiên phơi nắng.

Paragon House and Residence cách Bảo tàng dân tộc học Việt Nam 23 km và Lăng Chủ tịch Hồ Chí Minh 26 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách khách sạn 6 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng đẹp và chủ nhà rất thân thiện

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: Sạch sẽ ,nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Perfect for an early morning flight

review.rating: Great place to stay near the airport. They offered free transport to the airport which was great. Enjoyed our stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It was very clean and modern

review.rating: Good location but average for the price
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The location was good
review.comment_negative: The room was not so clean. We just stayed there for about 4-5 hours in the night after our flight. May be that's why the bed linens looked used. Also it was very noisy, we just wanted to take some rest after our flight but from very early morning everybody were banging doors.

review.rating: Great place to stay near the airport. They offered free transport to the airport which was great. Enjoyed our stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It was very clean and modern

review.rating: Good location but average for the price
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The location was good
review.comment_negative: The room was not so clean. We just stayed there for about 4-5 hours in the night after our flight. May be that's why the bed linens looked used. Also it was very noisy, we just wanted to take some rest after our flight but from very early morning everybody were banging doors.

review.rating: Ideal for a stay before or after a flight.

review.comment_positive: Good location to the airport, clean and staff were helpful.

review.rating: Quiet place near the airport for a one night stay

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
